revised_title: Propagation of Elms by Seed: A Letter from Sir R. Bulkley
tldr: Sir R. Bulkley shares his knowledge about a poor Irish laborer who has successfully propagated elm trees using seed. The laborer has raised a vast number of seedlings and sells them at a low cost. This method of propagation is neglected among planters, and it could be a valuable technique for growing elm trees.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Science
